AIXPertEntry.name: prereqlh
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for logindodherald: Checks whether herald value is set or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqbinaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for binaudit: Checks for available disk space to enable audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqda
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for disableacct: Adds /bin/false to shells in login.cfg, if it does not exist.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_logindodherald
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000400: CAT II) Set original login herald in default stanza, (GEN000410: CAT II): Remove DoD login banner in /etc/herald, (AIX00310: CAT II) Remove /etc/ftpaccess.ctl.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_fpmdodfiles
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (Multiple GEN items: CAT II) Change permissions of files and directories to AIX default.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_inetdservices
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000000-AIX0300,GEN003820-3860, GEN004800,GEN005140,GEN005280,GEN009140, GEN009160,GEN009180,GEN009190, GEN009200-9330: CAT I,II,III) Enable daemon and services: Uncomment entries in /etc/inetd.conf and re-start instances of daemon/services as applicable.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_services
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN003700,GEN003810,GEN003815, GEN003865,GEN007840,GEN007850: CAT II) This rule will check and configure inetd, portmap services and DHCP client as per default settings.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_coredumpdev
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN003510: CAT II) This rule enables kernel core dumps on the system.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_SMTPuucode
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN004640: CAT I) The SMTP service must not have a uudecode alias active.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_account
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000340,GEN000360: CAT II) UIDs and GIDs reserved for system accounts must not be assigned to non-system accounts or non-system groups.
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertGroup: User Group System and Password Definitions

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_fipspasswd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000590,GEN000585,GEN000590: CAT II) The system must use a FIPS 140-2 approved cryptographic hashing algorithm for generating account password hashes.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_lockacc_rlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000740: CAT II) All non-interactive/automated processing account passwords must be changed at least once per year or be locked, (GEN002640: CAT II) Default system accounts must be disabled or removed, (GEN000280: CAT II) Direct logins must not be permitted to shared, default, application, or utility accounts, (GEN000290: CAT II) The system must not have unnecessary accounts.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_nfsoptions
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005880: CAT II) The NFS server must not allow remote root access, (GEN005840: CAT II) The NFS server must be configured to restrict file system access to local hosts, (GEN005820: CAT II) The NFS anonymous UID and GID must be configured to values without permissions.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_nosuid
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005900: CAT II) The nosuid option must be enabled on all NFS client mounts.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_remoteconsole
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN001000: CAT II) Remote consoles must be disabled or protected from unauthorized access.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_tftp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005120: CAT II) A dedicated TFTP user account, a non-login shell, such as /bin/false, and a home directory owned by the TFTP user, (GEN005080: CAT I) The TFTP daemon must operate in secure-mode which provides access only to a single directory on the host file system.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_loginout
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000740: CAT II) All non-interactive/automated processing account passwords must locked, (GEN000280: CAT II) Direct logins must not be permitted to shared or default or application or utility accounts, (GEN002640: CAT II) Default system accounts must be disabled or removed.
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertGroup: User Group System and Password Definitions

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_restore_ntwkopts
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (Multiple GEN items: CAT II) Restore the value of all network options changed via DoDv2.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_minother
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000640: CAT II) Specifies the minimum number of non-alphabetic characters in a password to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_minspecialchar
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000640: CAT II) The system must require that passwords contain at least one special character.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_mindiff
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000750: CAT II) Specifies the minimum number of characters required in a new password to 4 that were not in the old password.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_defaultpwdintchk
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000790: CAT II) Default Password Integrity Check: Makes sure that the default password being set is not weak.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_chcronfiles
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN003280,GEN003300,GEN003320: CAT II) Configure at.allow and at.deny files.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_logindelay
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000480: CAT II) This rule will set logon delay to 4 seconds.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_chdodftpusers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN004880,GEN004900: CAT II) This rule will ensure the ftpusers file exists.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_chetchostsfiles
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN006620: CAT II) This rule will configure hosts.deny and hosts.allow files.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_chsyslog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN003660,GEN004460: CAT II) This rule will log auth and info data.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_rootrlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000980: CAT II, GEN001100: CAT I) This rule will disable rlogin.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_loginretries
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000460: CAT II) This rule will lock account after 3 consecutive failed logon attempts.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_minage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000540: CAT II) This rule will ensure the system global password configuration files are configured per password requirements.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_minlen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000580: CAT II) This rule will ensure all passwords contain a minimum of 14 characters.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_maxrepeats
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000680: CAT II) This rule will ensure passwords contain no more than three consecutive repeating characters.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_maxage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000700: CAT II) This rule will ensure the system global password configuration files are configured per password requirements.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_histsize
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000800: CAT II) This rule will ensure passwords will not be reused from the previous five changes.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_sndmailhelpfile
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN004540: CAT II) This rule will disable sendmail help command.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_dodaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN002660,GEN002720,GEN002740, GEN002760,GEN002800,GEN002820,GEN002825: CAT II, GEN002750,GEN002751,GEN002752,GEN002753: CAT III) Enable dodaudit: Enables bin auditing for DoD.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_mvhostsfiles
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN002040: CAT I) This rule will disable .rhosts and .shosts and hosts.equiv or shosts.equiv files.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_disablecde
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005260,GEN009340: CAT II) This rule will set X Window System connections and Xserver login manager to default values.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_disableX
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005160,GEN005200,GEN005220, GEN005240: CAT I and II) This rule will enabled X Window System programs.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_enablexntp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000240,GEN000241: CAT II) This rule will set the NTP service to default level.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_dodsecuretcpip
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000000-AIX00040: CAT II) The securetcpip command must be used.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_rotateauditdod
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN002860: CAT II) Audit logs must be rotated daily.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_sedconfigdod
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN003540: CAT II) The system must implement non-executable program stacks.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_trust
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (AIX00020,AIX00060,GEN000140,GEN000220, GEN006480,GEN006560,GEN008380,GEN002400: CAT II) The system must be checked weekly for unauthorized setuid files, as well as, unauthorized modification to authorized setuid files.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_disableacct
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN000760: CAT II) Accounts must be locked upon 35 days of inactivity.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_defaultssh
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (Multiple: CAT II) Set the SSH configuration settings back to default.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_ldapconfig
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (Multiple: CAT II) Restore LDAP configuration file to default.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_sendmaildod
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN004710: CAT II) Mail relaying must be restricted.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_chsnmp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005305,GEN005300,GEN005306: CAT II) SNMP service rules.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_rminet6
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN007700: CAT II, GEN007700: CAT II) Disable IPv6 protocol handler from network stack unless specified in the /etc/security/pscexpert/ipv6.conf file.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_gated
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005590: CAT II) The system must not be running any routing protocol daemons, unless the system is a router. This rule will disable gated.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_routed
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN005590: CAT II) The system must not be running any routing protocol daemons, unless the system is a router. This rule will disable routed.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_tcpwrapper
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN006580: CAT II) The system must use an access control program.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_printers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN003900: CAT II) The hosts.lpd file (or equivalent) must not contain a + character.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_ipsec
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN008540: CAT II) The system's local firewall must implement a deny-all, allow-by-exception policy, (GEN008520: CAT II) The system must employ a local firewall.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_ipsecport
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN008540: CAT II) The system's local firewall must implement a deny-all, allow-by-exception policy, (GEN008520: CAT II) The system must employ a local firewall.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_limitsysacc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: (GEN002960: CAT II) Access to the cron utility must be controlled using the cron.allow and/or cron.deny file(s), (GEN003060: CAT II) Default system accounts (with the exception of root) must not be listed in the cron.allow file or must be included in the cron.deny file, if cron.allow does not exist.

AIXPertEntry.name: dodv2_SecureLPM
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Required for LPM on AIX: Disable automated IPSEC Tunnel creation between VIO Servers during live partition migration.
